mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from coin_info
order by ${orderByClause}

update coin_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coin_name = #{record.coinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_address = #{record.contractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
